name: Bay 11
description: Bay 11, bred by Grand Daddy Purp, is a potent sativa strain with unspecified genetics. Its dense, pale buds are coated in amber resin with a sweet, fruity aroma that initiates immediate relaxation. A favorite strain for patients needing daytime relief, Bay 11 eases pain while boosting appetite. Bay 11 has a 67 day flowering period indoors, and outdoor gardens will be ready for harvest near the end of October.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Energetic, Relaxed, Creative, Depression, Insomnia, Stress, Pain, Fatigue, Anxious, Headache, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy
